page.title: 09MR.LISTER'S FARM,HAMBLETON.
page.content: Mr.Lister's farm is down St.Mary's Approach,Hambleton.Mr. Lister started work in 1953.He has now got a farm of his own in Hambleton.He gets up at 6.00am,and stops work at about 7.00pm.He has got 1 helper.He has got 120 acres of land which is used for farming.The crops that he grows are,Sugarbeet,Potatoes,Wheat and Barley.The machines that he has got are,3 Tractors,1 Combine,1 Beet machine,1 Bailer,4 Trailers,2 Cultivators,1 Side hoe,1 Sub soiler,2 Potatoes pickers and 2 sprayers.The 18 bulls that he has got are fatened up and killed for beef.The bulls that he keeps cost more to keep as they grow up.The busiest time of the year on the farm is autumn because Mr.Lister has got to plough the fields,rake the fields,seed the fields and then spray the fields.
